name: micro_sft_balanced
description: PREMIUM SFT corpus for Micro 9.4M model - 3 high-quality datasets (6M tokens): OASST1 + WizardLM + Orca

datasets.name: openassistant_v1
datasets.description: OpenAssistant OASST1 - PREMIUM QUALITY conversational data with human preferences

datasets.name: wizardlm_70k
datasets.description: WizardLM Evol-Instruct 70k - PREMIUM QUALITY complex instructions (ICLR 2024, superior to Alpaca)

datasets.name: open_orca
datasets.description: Open-Orca - HIGH QUALITY GPT-4 augmented dataset (1M samples, diverse reasoning tasks)

processing_metadata.template_rationale: Instruct format chosen for better tokenization efficiency
processing_metadata.sft_rationale: SFT optimal range: 6M tokens (0.65 tokens/param for 9.4M model)

dataset_distribution.oasst1: ~33% of tokens (2.0M) - PREMIUM conversational with preferences
dataset_distribution.wizardlm_70k: ~33% of tokens (2.0M) - PREMIUM complex Evol-Instruct, ICLR 2024
dataset_distribution.open_orca: ~33% of tokens (2.0M) - HIGH QUALITY GPT-4 augmented dataset

processing_metadata.training_efficiency: ~2,700 steps for 2 epochs, 1-2 hours on RTX 4090
